name: Dark Circle
description: A dark theme for animeonline, with edited next and previous buttons. Any feedback is greatly appreciated; especially in regards to changes or feature requests.
additional_info:
Current V. 0.9

Change Log
0.9
Fixed all known domain linking issues. Background is now fixed in place. 
    ***

0.8
Hot-fix next page bug and updated domains for all possible second level domains. 
    ***

0.7x ***
Added .vip domain. 
    ***

0.7 ***
Added new rules to update rest of pages. 
    ***

0.6 ***
Changed title bars, colors, so that text is more visible. 
    ***

0.5 ***
Initial push
    ***
